
#Plugin insertalbum

##Introduction

Allow to insert images stored in documents in a page via a "insert service" button.

Images are shown by jQuery plugins.


[Maven documentation and reports](http://dev.lutece.paris.fr/plugins/plugin-insertalbum/)
